storage_safety: Store in original tightly closed container in a shaded, dry, and well-ventilated area.
Do not freeze. Keep away from heat, sparks, and open flame.
Ensure container is always sealed after use to avoid contamination.
Wear gloves and safety goggles when handling. Avoid prolonged skin contact.
Use in well-ventilated areas only. Avoid breathing mist or vapors.
Dispose of unused product and container in accordance with local regulations.
Avoid runoff into drains or waterways.
